contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 16, 2002 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (First Section) 10 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-1st-section
The Forest of Dean
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Flugel horn—Treherbert and District Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 5 bands competed. First Section Champion Band of Wales: Ammanford Town Runners Up: Abergavenny Borough and Treherbert and District
Aug. 12, 2015, 2:21 a.m. July 2, 2020, 12:08 p.m.
1 Ammanford Silver Band Colin Hogg
2 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard
3 Tylorstown Band Leigh Phillips
4 Abergavenny Borough Band Lyndon Price
5 Rogerstone Band Ceri Thomas
